function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of data on informal settlements and the novelty of the disease","Impact":"Challenges in assessing acute and chronic vulnerability in LMICs","Mitigation":"Conducting local assessments and monitoring of vulnerability","Technologies":"Data collection and monitoring technologies","People":"Residents of informal settlements in LMICs","Owner":"Local health authorities and research institutions"},{"Description":"Epidemiological vulnerability to COVID-19, especially for those over 70 years of age and with underlying health conditions","Impact":"Higher risk of severe disease and death for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Improved healthcare access and targeted interventions for vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, and vaccination programs","People":"Elderly and individuals with cardiovascular disease, diabetes, chronic respiratory disease, hypertension, or cancer","Owner":"Healthcare providers and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Potential gender differences in infection rates, with men being almost twice as likely to die as women","Impact":"Gender-specific impacts on disease severity and mortality","Mitigation":"Addressing gender disparities in healthcare access and treatment outcomes","Technologies":"Gender-sensitive healthcare programs and interventions","People":"Men and women in LMICs","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and gender advocacy groups"}]}
